workExperiences.title: Senior Associate Software Engineer
workExperiences.description: Second rotation of the Technology Development Program. Working on an internal servicing application that Capital One agents use to service our customers. Full stack developer working on three backend APIs (two REST-based and one event based) and a front end application using Vue.

workExperiences.title: Associate Software Engineer
workExperiences.description: First rotation of the Technology Development Program. Worked on an enterprise platform team that was responsible for maintaining golden images (AWS, GCP, Docker) for all of Capital One's servers.

workExperiences.title: Software Engineering Consulting Intern
workExperiences.description: Served as a PO for a team devloping a React-based smart fridge system to implement image recognition, recipe recommendation, inventory tracking, and grocery list features.
